name: Black Cumin Seeds
description: Black cumin seeds are a type of seed that is native to India. They are a good source of protein and are low in fat. Black cumin seeds are also a good source of fiber, which helps to keep you feeling full and satisfied. They are a great addition to any meal and can be used in a variety of dishes.
